channel.title: How do i?
channel.description: Hi all im looking for a simple guide to make my own private server all for myself! ALSO i am looking for a coder and hoster for a new server i want to create! Im looking for someone that has some average knowledge of coding, I need a hoster for the server aswell!!! Both the coder and host will become co owners and have all the rights in the game!

item.title: How do i?
item.dc:creator: @abctest123abc abctest123abc
item.description:
@abctest123abc wrote:

I help you making server and coding but i dont need co-owner on your server cuz i got a own server
How to make a server:

First of all you need to download Java JDK: http://www.google.nl/search?sourceid=navclient&hl=nl&ie=UTF-8&rlz=1T4ADBF_nlNL305NL305&q=Java+download

Now you need to download WinRar go to http://www.rarlab.com

3rd. Go http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,49.0.html and download a Source.

4th. Go http://www.no-ip.com and register,go Host and redirects and make a new host
then you go “Downloads” and download No-ip DUC

  1. Go start > Run and type CMD
    you should see a black box promp
    Now type in Ipconfig

  2. Now remember your default gateway.

  3. Open your Web browser and type your default gate way (without www.)
    Now you need to log in your router
    as username you type “admin”
    and as pass “admin”

  4. Now go Virtual Servers
    And as IP-Adress you type your default gateway
    Port range: 43594
    As application you do anything you want

  5. Click Apply

  6. YOUR DONE!!!

If it still doesnt work:
Go start>Control Panel > Windows Firewall and open up port 43594 and name it “admin”

For codes just PM me

Hope this helped

Read full topic
